website_summaries.verdict: The pinpointer can detect various types of metal object around its probe.
pros: Detects metal objects about 3.5 inches from wand
3 sensitivity settings set the detection distance
Compact size of 10.8 inches and lightweight
Detected items trigger sound and vibration in wand
cons: Handle is not waterproof, only the probe
Better for detecting metal on a person than buried treasure

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pinpointer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say it exceeded my expectation for my first PinPointer. The quality of material is good doesn't feel cheap, sturdy. Accuracy of finding items has been great, it has helped me find coins, rings, and random metals. The green LED lights turn on when close to an item and vibrates - I find this very useful when item is deep gives you indication if you're getting close to it. There is also small light that is close to probe that comes in handy when metal detecting late in the day. Its really simple to use, single button.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T BEAT IT FOR THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: After I bought a Garrett Ace 250, I started looking for pinpointers. Most were almost as much as a beginner-level, full size metal detector. So, finding this one was a lifesaver. For $50 you get a pinpointer that could easily stand up against giants like Garrett and Bounty Hunter. Not only is the price great, the quality is also outstanding. With just one 9-Volt battery, you get a flashlight, a notification sound, and vibration to help find objects on the edge of a hole. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ONE GUYS!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Trauernicht

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Pinpointer!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this pinpointer! Shipping was fast and the packaging was very good. This detector will give you many years of service, and you can't beat the price. It comes with easy to read instructions and the one button operation makes it easy to operate. As a disclaimer, the manufacture offers a free gift to purchasers that write a review, but in my case I would have given it five stars anyway, for in all honesty it is the best pinpointer for the money. It also comes in very handy for locating studs in walls to hang pictures, so it has more uses than just detecting. Sincerely, Ossie Weinert
customer_reviews.author: Ossie Weinert

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and --> product works great
customer_reviews.text: Received my pinpointer metal detector in a few days,I really needed to use it because something very important went missing, I am hoping to find the missing item with the Pinpointer metal detector. Seems to work well, I pointed it towards various metal items and for all those it made one particular sound and light display, but for the gold ring it was totally different sound and light display. Great product, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GRAPEJAM6860

customer_reviews.title: Ricomax Pinpointer Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Ricomax Pinpointer. It is a very durable unit and is everything the seller says it is. I used it the very first day I received it , along with my full-sized detector and found this child's easy-bake oven (type) cookie cutter in 4 inches of soil in my back yard. What a time saver; from having to sift through a pile of dirt and sod. (For you metal detecting buffs) this item is more than likely 40 to 50 years old.
customer_reviews.author: DougJ

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a sleek, easy to use pinpointer that carries very easy in the field. It does a great job pinpointing targets and is a great tool to supplicate my metal detector. I really like the audible , visible , and vibrating alarms that will get your attention under all conditions. Thanks Ricomax for helping me out because of my bad knees. Once a target is found i do not have to stand back up to use the metal detector to locate the target which i do with the pinpointer .
customer_reviews.author: TOM G

customer_reviews.title: A great tool when you're treasure hunting!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife and June and she uses it every time she's out treasure hunting! It comes with a great little belt holster and she pretends like it's her secret weapon! She uses a larger metal detector to identify the general area of the search and them gets on her knees and uses the pinpointer for her final search. This is a must have if you're into treasure hunting and want a reliable device to make your adventure more productive!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: I live in California and I took this with me ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in California and I took this with me to a job site in Oregon thought it was going to take me forever to find what I needed with this tool I expected to be on a job all week I found the problem with this tool within an hour I was on the job site not even a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Spot on accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I literally read hundreds of reviews on A LOT of pinpointers as far as prices and reliability,this one stood head and shoulders above many of the more pricey ones. It's well made,fits nicely in the hand and is super sensitive. I started getting 'soundings' 2-3 inches from my targets . You only have to read the instructions once and you've got it. Of course it's not submersible . I'm recommending this pointer to my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Stealth

customer_reviews.title: Toughness and Durability a big 👍
customer_reviews.text: I use it for finding coins, jewelry or whatever is buried in the ground....I like everything about it except I wish it had a volume to control the beeping. Its toughness is a plus...I've must of dropped it so many times on the ground, in water and it keeps working to perfection
customer_reviews.author: daniel retiz

customer_reviews.title: Strongly DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This was not accurate, this thing beeped all the time, unless there is gold and silver all over my back yard then this is NOT a good product. They also didn't refund me everything I paid. I do not recommend this product. Spend more money and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, definately impressed with this pinpointer. I just got it today, and I'm glad I didn't fork out over a hundred dollars for it. I tested it out on my 14k gold wedding band, my partial knee replacement, a fake gold chain and some coins. There are 3 LEDs that light up, and it beeps in increasing order the closer you get to any metal. First led goes off at about 3 inches from the object. At 2" the second, then at about 1" the third lights up. I've been looking for one of these to go with my garret 550e.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: RM RICOMAX: Pinpointer - Model GC-2007
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this looks to be well made sturdy little tool. The 3 LED indicator lights work well when nearing the target item and the built in flashlight is a nice feature also. This is my first time buying a pinpointer so do not have anything to compare it with, so far for 50 bucks I am very happy with the purchase. I have been using it for just over a week and so far it has performed as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: TheSprilla

customer_reviews.title: Best Pinpointer For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased: March 2019 Bought from: Ricomax Hours used: Over 100 Have bought 3 different non-branded pinpointers from Amazon. This is by far the best. In tests with a quarter, this pinpointer was an inch deeper in detection than the other two. With over 100 hours use, it is still working as it should. The 3 indicator lights are great when wearing headphones. I can see signal strength. Enables me to recover targets faster. I will put this pinpointer up against one costing 2 times the money. Good pinpointer. Ricomax is a good seller with excellent customer service. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deep1

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to locate property markers covered by dirt and turf. I knew roughly where they are, so it was just a matter of waving the wand around a couple of inches off the ground. Near as I can figure, it goes off whenever you're about 3 inches (maybe a bit more) from the target, so all you have to do scan back and forth and to and fro, and then guess where the center of the indicated area is. Poke around with a pointy object and voila, you've found the thing in about 20 seconds. I gave it 4 stars rather than 5 only because the thing gives the occasional false alarm.
customer_reviews.author: archeopteryx

customer_reviews.title: Well made with unexpected features
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I'm new to treasure hunting so take this review in that light. As a beginner, here is what I like. The device is ergonomically designed. It is completely waterproof and sturdy. The battery compartment is completely sealed off with an "O" ring to protect that area from dirt and moisture. The one thing I was not expecting was a flashlight which provides light in the area where the target is located. I don't know how I missed that feature in the ad, but it is a nice addon. All in all, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Custom300

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use and accurate pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time metal detecting. I saw a lot of other pointers that were pretty bland and the Ricomax pinpointer’s features really caught my attention. First off, the fact that it is waterproof is a plus since I use it down by the lake. I love the way the lights turn on when you get closer to the metal objects as well as the vibrating feature. A pleasant surprise was the small flashlight built into the unit. It is great when dusk settles in and when looking in deeper holes. Easy to use, lightweight and accurate make this my favorite treasure hunting tool.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Agius

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't locate keys in grass
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this one didn't work for me. It couldn't find metal keys on a metal keychain in my lawn, no more than 3" from the surface. A standard metal detector did find them with no problem. Maybe I just got a defective one.... The device I received was accurate only if the metal object was large and relatively unobscured. I found that with decreasing object size, the accuracy plummeted unless the distance from the object (e.g., key, bracelet) was between 1-2" away. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kokonuts

customer_reviews.title: Big waste. Not worth it. Beeps all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. It would beep at the air, and at anything it felt like it. Very disappointing. I thought it would be good with all the reviews. Apparently I made a mistake. It would beep anywhere and everywhere, and when you tried to turn it off, you would have to press the button about 10 times to turn it off. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and shape of this, and the carrying case is an added bonus I wasn’t expecting. I used it around my yard and found some change, and some bolts that I lost months ago I even found a rusty nail. All in all for the price, and accuracy of this it’s pretty hard to beat, especially for a hobbiest on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sletterink

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying, but customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well. Bought for use while using my Minelab Metal Detector at the beach but find myself just using "pin-point" setting on the metal detector for more reliable and precise detection of ferrous materials despite it being more awkward. That being said, customer service reached out to me to address my specific issues once item was outside return window. I am pleased with their response and would do business with the seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to carry on the belt
customer_reviews.text: I used this at the beach to hunt for coins, and it worked very well. I had a little trouble with it in wet sand (seemed to alert constantly), but there may have been a lot of iron or other metals naturally occurring there. It found coins and bottle caps really quickly. I like that it shows different signal strengths to let you know when you're closing in on a target. The LED seems nice, but I can't say how that works yet, since it was mid-day. The holster is a nice accessory - easy to attach to even a wide belt (may work on molle loops, too).
customer_reviews.author: Justeen Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a  strap so you can carry it on your belt
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a couple of days. Installed a 9 Volt battery; read the simple instructions and off I went to the backyard. Worked great. It really makes metal detecting so much easier in pinpointing smaller items like coins and rings.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K.

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I bought this to check old lumber for nails before cutting. It works as advertised! It makes quick work of finding nails or any other metal before cutting. The only little negative is I wish you could turn off the L. E. D. Flashlight to save battery other than that great product. It arrived on time with a bag and belt holder as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dorinda Morpeth

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: So far this works great, very accurate. Only thing I mark it down for is the design of the flashlight. The bulb is recessed and quickly fills with dirt and is difficult to clean. Will never be as bright as it is pre-use because you just can't get all the dirt out. I recommend the manufacturer puts a small clear lens over the recessed area to keep it from getting packed with dirt. Other then that, it works very perfect
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Light Weight. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and I was like a kid. I started using it right away (on my family members...I found out my daughter had a belly button ring!) and it was amazing. When I used it with my metal detector it made finding small objects so much easier and precise. It's light weight and accurate. I love the holster as well. A must have for anyone needing a more precise tool when metal detecting. 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this metal detector to find my property lines, for some reason the neighbors moved a flag but the metal stakes are still there, only buried with dirt and pine needles. With in minutes the metal detector found the property lines and I remarked them. This is so light and easy to use it even came with it's own batteries. You do not need head phones it is loud enough to hear when it starts beeping.
customer_reviews.author: dmb

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when it worked. Only used it occasionally, changed the battery one day and it quit working. The LED light comes on but the button no longer does anything and it doesn't sense metal. Amazon says the "support window has closed". Bummer. Definitely getting another pinpointer, just not this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Not gold finder
customer_reviews.text: It works with coins and metal bot not with gold most reviews here just write good things cuz when u get this they offer something to put a good review about this item so im honest it doesn't work for gold
customer_reviews.author: Ali J Velasco Cruz

customer_reviews.title: WORKS for detecting!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't personally gone out yet to mess with it, but my husband used it at work to find rebar in a block wall and said it works for that!! So once I get out and about, I'll know more but I did mess with it in the house for finding nails in walls and threw some coins and stuff on the table and put a book over them and it went off, so I can't wait to go use it for real!!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Lorizzo

customer_reviews.title: Find what you've detected
customer_reviews.text: This pinpoint metal detector can detect metallic objects on it's own but it is most useful in finding what you've detected with a regular, large metal detector. Once you've found an object and started digging, use this pinpoint detector to examine the hole and the material that you've removed from the hole...you'll find your object in a hurry and you won't miss finding what you detected. A great time saver and its small size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for metal detection
customer_reviews.text: When I got a full size metal detector I didn't see the need for a wand like pinpoint detector. I was wrong. Having the smaller device to poke around in the pile of dirt I dug up made things so much easier, especially around an old barn where there are lots of small metal objects. The Ricomax works great and was the least expensive option for someone who is not sure they really need a pinpoint meter.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the hobbyist!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjunction with my Garrett ACE 350 for pinpointing small items after the initial "hit" from the Garrett. For my needs, I had a hard time justifying the cost of the Garrett pinpointer. I purchased this model and I feel it does an excellent job for my intended purpose at roughly 40% of the cost of the Garrett. It is also super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: The Pinpointer is an excellent product. I particularly like its sleek design, flashlight, ease of operation, and sensitivity. The three flashing lights enable the user to determine immediately the amount of metal detected. This is helpful if one is looking for a large item near nails or other small metal objects: if only one light flashes, then one knows immediately that the large item isn’t in this location. This is definitely a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality Materials Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It came sooner than was expected. It definitely met my expectation for my first Pin Pointer. Accuracy of finding items has been great. The LED lights turn on when close to an item and it vibrates in your hand. There is also a small LED light that lights up the area your detecting in. Its really simple to use, single button activation. Also came with a small bag and a belt holster.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Rand

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I just got this pin pointer and already I am convinced. I have been going about everywhere and find that it performs as well as any I have researched if not better than several better known brand names. I have tested it for proximity, operation, and quality of construction. I believe it will full fill every reasonable expectation I have and the item will bring me pleasure as a device to do casual searches as I plan to do. I expect to keep it in my car for the impromptu search for coins, lost items and other things near the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Derrel E. Emmerson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, nice package
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It turns on, it beeps, it vibrates, more whennear metal/conductive objects. Did a test run with it and it was very useful in finding where to dig when using the metal detector. Seemed well made, basic, held up to being run through the dirt. Would have liked clearer instructions as it had a tendency to go off in mid air and when pressed into the ground, but i would assume these are calibration errors. Came with a nice bag and holster as well. My mom says this would work great for ghost hunters.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pin Pointer
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome, it will save you lots of time and effort. Much better than the cheaper ones I bought as they tended to detect in every direction equally. It literally is a pin pointer, it gets you on the item quickly once in the hole (sometimes even through dirt before digging once you have a location with your main detector). After you dig a little this also helps you find the item in the dirt you removed quickly to keep you from digging more than you need to. I am glad I bought it every time I use it, time is precious and this thing saves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great value pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: My first pinpointer and it so far has been the best investment I’ve made in this hobby! First day out I was able to accurately locate many different types of metal, and in record time. The vibration function is especially nice on days when the wind is blowing in your ear! For the price, you really can’t go wrong with this pinpointer!
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: When using the pointer, keep other metal objects away from the spot you're searching.
customer_reviews.text: The day my pointer arrived in the mail I grabbed my granddaughter and to the park we went. Everything my large metal detector toned on we were able to retrieve with the pointer. Before getting this pointer I maybe was able to find half of what my metal detector had toned on. I'm looking forward to my next treasure hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Semperfi1/7

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made easy to use Pin Pointer. Once you find something in dirt with the metal detector , if its small like a ring or coin it can take a long time to find it. This pin Pointer finds it fast for you. Just point it at the dirt and it quickly finds it for you. I wouldn't go metal detecting without one.
customer_reviews.author: D Long

customer_reviews.title: The pinpointed was easy to use right out of the bag.
customer_reviews.text: We did a test first thing and then took it to the beach where we had lots of opportunity to use it in tandem with our metal detector. Only found bottle caps, foil and a tent stake(so the beach was pretty clean, YEAH!) but it was a good experience to build on. There's only one button which makes it real easy to use. Being waterproof is a plus for use in the Pacific Northwest. The belt holster made for easy access, one less thing you have to carry keeping your other hand free.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great product
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built and works as advertised. I really like the led lights that give you an idea of how close you are to the metal object. I've been using a Garrett which I like alot, but this will be a very serviceable backup. Can't comment on the waterproof aspect. At this price point, it seems to be a very good value for what you get. Overall, I'm happy. Probably couldn't find a better one without spending twice as much!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. This metal detector wand is very sensitive and picks up on things very quickly. This is a must have tool for your metal detecting. The led light is a big help and the 1 button functionality makes it even easier to operate. I highly recommend this to pinpoint your finds.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the weight and feel of it. The sensitivity level is exactly what I expected. Lots of battery life, vibrate and sound is great. Only negative thing I ca say about it is it seems to sometimes get stuck on a false positive and needs to get turned off and on again, which I do a lot anyhow. 9.5/10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Karhatsu

customer_reviews.title: An essential tool!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and step daughter love using our metal detector to find “hidden treasures”, however, have nearly driven themselves crazy trying pinpoint what is setting off the detector. This has already become an essential tool in their “treasure hunts”. It is compact and easy to use. It even comes with a holster so it can be readily available for use. I highly recommend purchasing this in conjunction with a traditional metal detector, or even by alone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Marks

customer_reviews.title: How I use the Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the metal detector to find nails under the surface of wood bowling lanes that have boards that are bring replaced. Replacement lengths range from as short as 3 inches to as long as 18 inches and its a must that you avoid nails with the router bit. The detector works finding most nails. Thank You for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P

customer_reviews.title: great to have
customer_reviews.text: it works great. I tested it by having a family hide some thing in a hole then cover it up. I used it to find what they put in the dirt. then tested on my uncle knee. it gone off right at the point where it was at. plus tested it on the side range and that was great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Great and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 10th birthday to metal detect around our river. Her twin got the full size detector and his came with a "bonus pinpointer." We had a great comparison to write this review Pros: -Longer distance -Better locator -Shows how far down (circle indicate depth to 3 inches) -Mini Light for dark -Tip waterproof Cons: - not entirely waterproof -No silent button -When placed in case you have to shut off or it goes off as it detects the metal in the belt case Overall great pinpointer, reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amaris Beal

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginners and kids
customer_reviews.text: My son and I are just getting into metal detecting and we purchased this to add to our collection of gear. It is easy to use for both me and my son. It comes with a carrying sleeve and is lightweight enough to put on a belt for hands free carrying while on the go. After using it several times I would recommend this product. Shipping was also fast and product arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a brand new "detectorist" receiving my metal detector at Christmas. It didn't take long to discover that I needed a pinpointer to help me locate finds. The popular name brand version was too much $$ to spend for a new hobby, so I found this unit for much less. I trusted the reviews an they are correct this time, this is a good quality little unit and does a great job. I would not hesitate to order another one should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: KenB

customer_reviews.title: The best pinpointer and I've had a few.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. It's easy to use, light weight and beginner user friendly and the batteries last a long time. I wasn't able to find out where the others I had were telling me to go and the first time I used this one in my back yard I found a 1940 wheat penny!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dinnocenti

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this pinpointer!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few weeks and it is remarkably accurate and sensitive to even the smallest objects - even some small gold flakes in the pan. I would highly recommend this pin pointer so far. I have used it in the rain and even submerged in water a few inches. Works great and the batteries last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: Great Pinpointer detector
customer_reviews.text: Having recently bought this,I am limited on experience, but in using it it picked up signals just fine and was loud and clear to me when it went off. It was easy to use and feels good in the hand. I am sure I will enjoy this product and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a metal detector prior to buying this pinpointer. I wish I could have just bought this instead of the metal detector. It helped me located the iron pipes buried by surveyors to indicate my property limits. And that was on the second attempt!
customer_reviews.author: CORA ZAOS

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works really good, I use it to find nails, spikes, wire and all kinds of metal embedded in logs before putting the log the sawmill, saves me a lot of time sharpening blades or buying new blades. Lot easier to use than the big metal detectors.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pinpointer !
customer_reviews.text: This RM RICOMAX Pinpointer is amazing! I recently got a metal detector which makes use of a search coil. I found it sometimes difficult to pinpoint an item within a target zone. I would dig the target zone but had difficulty finding the item within the hole or dirt. The search coil is great at narrowing the location down but is just too big to pinpoint the item to an exact location. Situations like these are where this RM RICOMAX pinpointer helps out lot and speeds the hunting process up. Overall, this pinpointer is an excellent addition to any detectorist.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for our Garrett metal detector.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use along with a Garrett metal detector on our "treasure" hunting excursions. After checking all the wifes jewelry, finding all the nails in the subfloor under our carpet, bugging the dog by checking his ID tags, etc.... we went outside in our old farm yard. Right away we found an old wrench in the ground over by an old machine shed and a really old toy car buried in what must have been a play area for kids at one time. It is so easy and fun to use! I'll try to upload a pic or two of our discoveries later...
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for any skill level and any age.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this purchase, I was digging holes and sometimes the holes became twice the size trying to find the object. Once I started using it, the were small and item pinpointed in seconds. My locate, dig and retrieve item time has gone from a couple minutes to under 1 min.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday, as he is new to the metal detecting world and just starting his adventures in metal detecting. He read through the instructions, and had my daughters hide things and jewelry around the house, and found every single item, even IN the couch! He really likes how lightweight and easy it is to use. He has gotten us all excited and we can't wait to go out as a family and start finding some treasures!
customer_reviews.author: Tera Emter

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Picks up items that it is not in direct contact with. Any item i had a hit with using the large metal detector the pinpoint was able to help me find. Ground is very wet and muddy where ive been searching so being able to pinpoint items is critical. The only issue i noticed so far is that occasionally it will just start detecting metal objects without being near anything metal and keep beeping until you touch something metal to reset it. This was due to low battery so make sure to keep the battery fresh. Overall very good considering that similar items are much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kuriger

customer_reviews.title: It really pinpoints the metal!
customer_reviews.text: When the light is shined on the metal the signal sounds. I used it on the beach and although I did not find any buried treasure, the device accurately detected metal. I did find that the user needs to slowly scan the area.
customer_reviews.author: MLDjerseyshore

customer_reviews.title: This is a very accurate pinpointer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad for Christmas. He absolutely loves it and says it works with great accuracy. He tried using his metal detector without it and found that it saves him so much time in recovering his treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Reed

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cool little tool
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool little tool!! My husband has already tried it out.Works great, light weight,easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mills

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!! Ricomax Pinpointer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to make my experience and finding a lot easier. This thing is so sensitive that I have to remember not to use my left head due to it picking up my wedding ban so easily. Can't really understand the different settings but that is user fault due to me not reading instructions. I recommend this product to anyone who wants to join in on metal detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Best pinpointer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and very sensitive. The indicator lights and beeps show how far away the metallic object is (about 3 inches gets a slow beep and one light, 2 inches faster beep and two lights, and fast beeps with all three lights when you're right on it. The Ricomax pinpointer came with a handy belt holster and even included the battery! This is the best buy for the bucks. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy use, quality for $$ and looks good too
customer_reviews.text: I do like product. I will be searching for lost stuff on some old trails and around own house. Can’t wait to give a quality and long test review, at another time. Also purchased INTY detector to have both helpers. John
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Vanderheyden

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used a pinpoint detector before. But, I have been pleasantly surprised how many more items this tool has allowed me to find. I’ve easily picked up everything from coins to pieces of aluminum can tabs. It works as well in clay as it does in sand. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: love to shop!

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It says that it’s waterproof Atleast the probe is, but right on the owners Manuel it says it’s not waterproof at all. ( It’ll ruin the operation of it) it does not detect far at all, I placed my ring in the grass and it’ll only detect when I’m literally placing the detector right on it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Bargain PinPointer
customer_reviews.text: I really got to work using this pin pointer and found coins very quickly after pulling a dirt plug. I tried using the built in pin pointer with my Minelab, but that is just useless in most cases. Using this Ricomax pin pointer is a great deal. The snap that holds the holster to my belt is not very strong and falls off, so I'm using a wire tie to attach it to my metal detector, which is what I wanted to do anyway. I'm not going to take away a star for that, but don't expect it to work on your belt. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I literally read hundreds of reviews on A LOT of pinpointers as far as prices and reliability,this one stood head and shoulders above many of the more pricey ones. It's well made, fits nicely in the hand and is super sensitive. I started getting 'readings' 2-3 inches from my targets . You only have to read the instructions once and you've got it. I'm recommending this pointer to all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer prodehl

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My family and i have been metal detecting for a few years. We decided to get the RICOMAX metal detector pinpointer to help us out on our treasure seeking. It is amazing! it is so accurate, we use to have to take handfuls out and use the metal detector on that never knowing which area the treasure is hiding. Now with the pinpointer it is so much easier to track down the treasure. We have found horseshoes, bullets, nails, etc. with this pinpointer. Its awesome I highly recommend getting this. It will make your metal detecting experience so much better!
customer_reviews.author: k taylor

customer_reviews.title: MOST ACCURATE AND EASIEST TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I JUST RECEIVED MY SECOND RICOMAX GC-2007 PINPOINTER METAL DETECTOR SINCE I LOVE MY FIRST ONE PURCHASED AND DO NOT WANT TO BE LEFT WITHOUT ONE ANYTIME IN THE FUTURE. THIS HANDYLITTLE POINTER HAS SAVED ME HOURS OF DIGGING AND MAKES RELIC HUNTING THAT MUCH MORE ENJOYABLE. THE RICOMAX IS THE BEST OF 6 DIFFERENT SMALL DETECTORS I HAVE HAD IN THE PAST AND I JUST LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES - CENTER CROSS, VA

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to find the hidden wires in pallet wood. It finds the smallest pieces of wire between nails and small staples!! It has saved me a lot of money on ruined saw blades!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I just received this last week and already found a dime and a penny. Okay I knew my brother in law dropped some change off my porch. It works as described. I've had fun testing things all over the house and yard. I can't wait to take it everywhere I can.
customer_reviews.author: Snoqvalley

customer_reviews.title: Works great on beach with loud surf
customer_reviews.text: This emits a loud tone that is easy to hear over the noise of the surf when using at beach. Easy on and off, no interference from my pulse detector, convenient holster that snaps around your belt.
customer_reviews.author: Teflon Man

customer_reviews.title: Great little companion to my metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Just received this but very happy with it so far. I am impressed by the accuracy and the number of items I found in my yard in the first 30 mins. I have not had time to locate my property corners yet but I know if they are there to be found, this will be the tool to do it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect since there are so many different brands out there but this Ricomax was rated the best online so I tried it. It is exactly like the picture. Well made, easy to use, waterproof and accurate. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Marr

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to start your adventure.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is simple and easy to use. Comes supplied with the battery so you're ready to go once unpackaged. It also come with a nice holder that can be laced on your hip with your belt and a nice storage bag for storage when not in use. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benami

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD FOR THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Pinpointer for the money. Took it out the first day I got it and it worked as expected. Having a Pinpointer to search with after you open your plug makes all the difference and the Ricomax did not disappoint. Found a few clad quarters in a local park just to test it. LED flashlight could be a bit brighter, but overall a good device.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Effective and User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I found this pinpointer to be pretty accurate. I like that it beeps faster and lights up more as you get close to the target. I’m new to metal detecting and found it very easy to operate. It significantly reduced the time it was taking me to find my target in the hole using an inferior pinpointer. As someone else said, it’s kind of sensitive and I found that it was picking up my metal detector if it was too close but all around I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Neil M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this purchase because it was one of the lower prices detectors on Amazon. But after seeing the other reviews I thought I’d give it a shot. Glad I did. I am pleasantly surprised. Great build and easy to use. Haven’t tested it out in the real world yet, but excited to.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Works well, saves time
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this pin pointer. It is much more sensitive than the free one that came with my detector. It is able to detect 2 to 3 inches away. Saves time digging signals.
customer_reviews.author: Ben H

customer_reviews.title: Great Pinpointer, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pin pointer for when I'm out metal detecting. I tested it out on random metal objects and it worked perfectly!! It's just what I wanted/needed and is going to make metal detecting alot easier. When my regular metal detector detects something I go in with my pinpointer and it lets me know exactly where my "treasure" is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my mother to use while shes crouching down trying to find things in the smaller area. It works well for her. She like it quite well.
customer_reviews.author: tactech

customer_reviews.title: If your a treasure hunter, you need this pinpointer on your belt !!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pinpointer with my garrett ace metal detector. This pinpointer is the best, because of its features it has. A audible sound I can easily hear and vibration to identify coins etc in places im searching. Also has a led light that lights up when im in places with dark areas. Its very sensitive and locates any object accurately. I don't leave home without it. The Velcro holster for my belt, is very handy to carry my pinpointer on my side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to metal detecting, so i started out with just the metal detector and a shovel. My current goal was tracing the remains of an old logging railroad that ran thru our property. After several hours i realized that a pinpointer was going to make things a lot easier. i'ts hard to tell if you found a railroad spike or just a small brad nail. With this ricomax pinpointer i was able to quickly locate what i found and move on to the next spot.
customer_reviews.author: D Giesen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Great value, Works just like it is supposed to. Like the vibration feature and how the three lights lite up to let you pinpoint the item. Used it for fun treasure hunting and also to help pinpoint a survey marker. Works great and would recommend this to anyone. I give it five stars
customer_reviews.author: grandma Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great Assistant
customer_reviews.text: At first I was at first dubious of a pinpointer. But once I received the Ricomax Pinpointer, installed the included battery, I was ready to try it out. And disappointed I was not! It really does pinpoint your “find” and is so much fun to use. It is a valuable tool. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The Pinpointer metal detector exceeded my expectations. It is sensitive to several inches, has visual lights as well as vibration to indicate the presence of metal. I also like the fact that the product is waterproof and comes with a holster.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Always locates the object in the ground.. even if its only a tiny screw!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pinpointer. I have never had a problem with it. It always targets exactly where the item is in the ground and the three lights are super helpful for knowing how much further and in which direction I should dig. I highly recommend this pinpointer!
customer_reviews.author: KS2017

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: Great pinpointer. It seems as sensitive as my more expensive Pinpointer, which surprised me. It seems durable and should Last a long time. Very easy to use. It performs as advertised. A great Pinpointer for the price. I recommend this Pinpointer to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P. Utke

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: When digging out dirt this was very accurate and made it much easier to find things. Highly recommend this to go along with the RM RICOMAX Metal Detector - High-Accuracy Metal Finder with LCD Display. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Changeling

customer_reviews.title: It found the border pin in few minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable product. It found the pin in few minutes. .....and I was able to construct my wooden fence with peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Asif Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Found what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Found our property stakes. You do need a plat of survey and tape measure. You need to get close for it to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walters

customer_reviews.title: Suitable first pinpointer.....
customer_reviews.text: This pinpointer is highly recommended as an entry level pinpointer. At 40dollars approximate, it doesnt dissapoint. Not waterproof but does get good depth.
customer_reviews.author: cyknife

customer_reviews.title: Handheld metal detector
customer_reviews.text: We love this little metal detector it works really good and I like the belt holder what's your hands be free so hold your big metal detector perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RM RICOMAX Pinpointer metal detector.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go along with my Garrett ACE 300 series metal detector. Haven't had a chance to use it yet but I'm looking forward to it in the near future. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: mogreasy

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as expensive ones !
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing ! Works as well as expensive pinpointers, I'm glad I bought this one. Makes finding items faster and easier . :) Very accurate too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and David

customer_reviews.title: East to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just a little hard to distinguish the different sounds that it makes. Overall an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna

product_meta.title: RM RICOMAX Metal Detector Pinpointer - [3 LED Range Indicators & Buzzer Vibration Sound] [IP66 Partially Waterproof & 10.8 Inch Lightweight] Handheld Metal Detector Pinpointer with Belt Holster
feature_bullets: 🌞🌞 [3 SENSITIVITY LEVELS FOR 360° AREA OF DETECTION] - There are three sensitivity levels with different flashlights (3 LED lights), ratio audio and vibrate alert to the different distance between the sensor and objects. The closer they are, the louder it sounds and the green LED lights to flash one after the other. Avoid lots of unnecessary digging. Spare your time outdoors for a memorable treasure hunting!

🌞🌞 [SIMPLE ONE-BUTTON OPERATION EASY TO USE] - Quick button press instantly tunes out environment or narrows detection field for precise pinpointing of larger targets. When the detector approaches a metal object, it automatically flashes, sounds an alarm and vibrates. All you need to do is turning it on and starting hunting treasures! Perfect for various people like kids, men, and seniors.

🌞🌞 [COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT PORTABLE DESIGN] - The length and weight of the metal detector pinpointer are only 10.8 inches and 5.9 ounces respectively. Perfect handheld size contains multiple modes which are professionally designed as small as possible. The pin pointer part of the detector is IP66 waterproof design. You can sink the probe into water and detect whether there is metal in it. NOTES: Please DO NOT sink the whole body into water.

🌞🌞 [ACCURATELY DETECT VARIOUS TYPES OF METAL] - Helps you rapidly and accurately uncover coins, gold, silver, relics, jewelry and other goodies in the ground by targeting various types of metal objects about 3.5" from the wand in variety of hunting conditions ranging from highly mineralized ground to saltwater-saturated sand. Achieve small-scale precise positioning that full-size metal detectors cannot do.

🌞🌞 [PERFECT GIFT FOR KIDS] - RM RICOMAX pinpointer metal detector is a perfect gift for your kids with a small size . Let them go treasure hunt and help them exercise their exploratory skills and curiosity. What a meaningful gift! Meanwhile, it includes 1x Belt Holster, 1x Carrying Bag, and it could be taken to everywhere you want.
